column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE SECURED. WE HAVE ENTERED THE BUILDING. LOOKS EMPTY. OVER.
ALPHA TO BRAVO. READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE MIGHT HAVE A SITUATION HERE, REQUESTING CAS TO OUR OBJECTIVE. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. LANDING ZONE IN SIGHT. GET READY. OVER.
GOOD LUCK BOYS. GO GET 'EM. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. READY FOR EXTRACTION. MOVE IT. OVER.
ROGER THAT ALPHA. WE ARE ON OUR WAY. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. ROGER THAT WE ARE SENDING YOU GUNSHIP SUPPORT. HOLD TIGHT AND DONT CALL THE EXTRACT BIRD TO A HOT LZ. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME HOME TEAM. OVER.
